divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were sitting on the front porch around 6:45 when I saw two, big, bright, lite- blue lights apppear. I told my wife to look and thats when she saw them too. They were moving very quickly and silently from right(north) to left(south). We live near a nuclear power plant and the airspace around here is restricted. We both watched the lights as they moved across in front of us and then they just disappeared, gone, poof. They were big, moved quickly but made no noise, before they disappeared. I looked in the newspaper and on the internet today to see if anyone had reported seeing a ufo in the area last night and I could find no reports of any
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hartsville
There were no other sightings in Hartsville on or around December 3rd 2011
Summary: two bright big blue-white lights move from left to right and then just disappeared as we watched
